title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.13 - Sightseeing parking areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.13 - Sightseeing parking areas

State Regulations

The fee for parking passenger automobiles in designated
sight-seeing parking areas for each period such areas shall be open shall be.. $.50...................................................................................................................................................................................... (plus six percent of New York City sales
tax)

Notes

1263.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
